body_html: Thank you. I agree, as with explicitly placing the dynamic_rnn call on the cpu, the error does not occur when I include soft_placement in the config. But my goal is actually to put it on the gpu, if possible.

body: Thank you. I agree, as with explicitly placing the dynamic_rnn call on the cpu, the error does not occur when I include soft_placement in the config. But my goal is actually to put it on the gpu, if possible.
